This is an electron application. It is an email program. It helps to send multiple emails to the clients. It is built using electron, react, and nodejs. The application has the following features:

- Extract names from pdf file.
- Add pdf to email as attachment.
- Send multiple emails with different attachments.
- Save user emails for future use.
- Use sqlite for storing user emails.
- Has English and German language support.
- Has smtp configuration for email sending.
- Has a settings where user can define predefined email body.

- Application has auto update feature.
